thread.title: Michael Smith

author: Michael Smith
title: Michael Smith
text: I bought. Christmas gictz about six weeks before Christmas, and not one salesperson mentioned this to me, and my receipts did not reflect this upcoming change in policy. I found out several weeks ago when I tried to take some purchases back. As you can tell, I'm still upset about it. Kohls wouldn't even give me store credit. They have now lost a lifetime monthly customer. I will choose a store with the standard 90 day return policy. No wonder Kohls is doing so poorly in the market and closing so many stores.
